text: Woh dabay huey log un baday banne walon se kahenge, ‘Nahin, balke shab-o-roz ki makkari thi jab tum humse kehte thay ke hum Allah se kufr karein aur dusron ko uska humsar thehrayein.” Aakhir e kaar jab yeh log azaab dekhenge to apne dilon mein pachtayenge aur hum in munkireen ke galon mein tauq (bedi/fetters) daal denge. Kya logon ko iske siwa aur koi badla diya ja sakta hai ke jaise aamal unke thay waisi hi jaza woh payein
